summary: Adds a small quest mod about a daughter wanting to find her Fathers ancestral sword.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small quest about a Daughter wanting to find her Father's Ancestral Sword that was lost when he was killed while exploring a cave beneath their home. There are two dungeons added and one is radiant ready. This is my first attempt at modding so I'm sure there will be mistakes, so any constructive criticism will be appreciated. Sorry the dialogue isn't recorded so you will have to turn on subtitles (there are only a few lines).

This has been tested with several different characters at different levels, completely Navmeshed by hand and tested with followers, and cleaned with TES5edit.

Should not be any conflicts with other mods except those that use the same locations. 

Edit: Added a screenshot with the locations
author: Aragorn58
